name: Share Mounts
description: Ensures all Unraid SMB/NFS shares are mounted.
check_cmd: grep -vE 'proc|sysfs|cgroup|tmpfs' /etc/fstab | awk '{print $2}' | while read m; do mountpoint -q $m || echo $m; done
fix_cmd: grep -vE 'proc|sysfs|cgroup|tmpfs' /etc/fstab | awk '{print $2}' | while read m; do mount $m 2>/dev/null || true; done
verify_cmd: grep -vE 'proc|sysfs|cgroup|tmpfs' /etc/fstab | awk '{print $2}' | while read m; do mountpoint -q $m || echo $m; done
